questions.question:
Round the following number to nearest 10:
63

7,552

The human body has 206 bones. Can it be rounded off to the nearest 100?
Answer Yes or No.

School begins at 8 am. Can it be rounded off to the nearest 10?
Answer Yes or No.

Answer Yes or No.
